peril.views.slick.components.menus

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.util.Viewable
      • peril.views.slick.util.Clickable
        • peril.views.slick.components.menus.Menu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Container
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChallengeMenu, HelpMenu, PauseMenu, StatsMenu, UpgradeMenu, WarMenu

    public abstract class Menu
extends Clickable
implements Container, Component
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a menu that can be displayed in a InteractiveState. This also implements Container and extends Clickable.
    Since:
    2018-02-25
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy, Ezekiel_Trinidad
    See Also:
    Clickable, Container, Component

      • Menu

        public Menu(java.lang.String name,
            GameController game,
            Region region)
        Constructs a new Menu. Initially invisible.
        Parameters:
        name - The string representation of this Menu.
        game - The GameController that allows this Menu to query the state of the game.
        region - The Region that denotes this Menu on screen.
